name: F AIR Flight School Ltd
about: F AIR Ltd. is the first JAR certified flight school in the Czech Republic, established in 1990 and located near Prague. With modern premises, a quality back office, restaurant, and accommodation at Bene≈°ov Airport, F AIR offers comprehensive training for aspiring pilots. The school boasts a fleet of 44 modern aircraft and an FNPT II simulator, training individuals for both recreational and professional aviation careers. F AIR has graduated over 2900 students from 40 different nationalities and is recognized for its significant contribution to Czech aviation. Certified by EASA, CAAC, and ISO9001, F AIR ensures high standards in aviation education, making it the premier choice for those seeking to become safe and skilled pilots.
